Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location but average hotel”
Reviews.Author: London_boy70
Reviews.Content: like stay overnight airport hotel long flight however airport hotel like sofitel terminal 5 always use london pullman best location madrid airport main purpose pullman hotel accommodate business travellers attending numerous hotel ideally situated rooms clean comfortable staff helpful attentive like stay whenever travelling madrid

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: mhazelton
Reviews.Content: airport get modern hotel underground shuttle bus options pretty easy safe hotel nicely refurbished rooms used sofitel modern comfort nice strong colours black red grey bathroom beautiful stylish breakfast served relatively small restaurant far remember daylight whole room bar area located middle reception area bit courtyard adequate class hotel opinion overall good choice business area fair grounds

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location”
Reviews.Author: DavenCaff
Reviews.Content: large rooms exceptional bed quality free internet location good business trip interested going madrid otherwise far centre food restaurant good expensive

Reviews.Title: “Will Be Back”
Reviews.Author: Andrew N Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: used stay hotel 1 night starting flight next day hotel features free shuttle service airport didnt use since arrived car usual booked hotel mistake made reservation mixed month april instead may front office manager said dont worry try manage gave room price original reservation took 5 minutes receptionist spoke perfect english unusual spain helpful friendly room great nothing complain sleeping quality fantastic lots comfortable pillows helpful since next day long connecting flight free wifi room hotel located new business area apart historic centre madrid may reach sol 30 minutes metro close hotel efficient price ride 1 eur didnt go breakfast since preferred sleep flight take meal airport

Reviews.Title: “Great choice of hotel and location”
Reviews.Author: Chapel_lad
Reviews.Content: stayed conference close nice hotel clean rooms new upscale food good restaurant great included breakfast location great pleasure extremely close subway though efficient lot stuff close hotel except work

Reviews.Title: “Amsterdam at its best!”
Reviews.Author: xxLaniexx
Reviews.Content: couple nights earlier year january standard 4 star hotel surprises requested quiet room given room located air con equipment kitchen area probably room change werent staff frontdesk bad non professional rooms comfortable small side reason common areas smelling plastic pleasant location bad really first time visitors took 40 minutes reach main places interest

Reviews.Title: “Not bad and great location”
Reviews.Author: EmmaS1983
Reviews.Content: spend one night madrid get flight next day really liked close airport rooms spacious modern clean staff extremely friendly helpful free shuttle airport every 30 minutes one thing found bit disturbing overpriced meals hotels restaurant small dinner breakfast two cost us hotel room excellent hotel eat outside possible

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant surprise in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Rita R Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: quiet rooms could hear guests beds comfortable made room extra dark added second room checkin found front desk charging less online travel website reservation inroom internet available crazy charge per 24 hrs business friendly hotels travel offer internet connections free last year property sofitel hotel

Reviews.Title: “Dirty! & rude staff!”
Reviews.Author: Seanhil
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night catching flight like previous reviewer said rooms less would expect found hard sleep room hot air conditioning useful reception staff helpful upon arrival restaurant closed 930 open 1130 stayed several near airports disappointing

Reviews.Title: “very comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: alan130960
Reviews.Content: fourstar hotel offering reasonably comfortable accommodation much else although rooms would expect standard hotel comfortable bed desk flatscreen tv shower screen decent toiletries also small couple booking week struggle find sufficient wardrobe storage space breakfast room lobby bar restaurant also smaller might expect feel cramped busy breakfast cold buffet selection fruit breads cold meats cheeses pastries none particularly good supposedly hot option one seems order staff certainly guests breakfast costs 25 euros complete rip price bar offers small selection tapas ok prepared wait service slow even madrid standards service restaurant slightly better food nothing special one worst things hotel location convenient airport yes short cab ride away also bang middle boring part madrid want see real city choice taking taxi expensive travelling metro metro station round corner hotel still journey places interest read service hotel whole found okay better needs one day maids forgot make room hoping management would offer us late checkout following day compensation nothing normally would give type hotel three stars attitude late checkout ripoff price breakfast cost star would recommend hotel anything stopover airport crash people business immediate vicinity

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous hotel, excellent value”
Reviews.Author: leeney29
Reviews.Content: sofitel decent spot airport proximity offers little else rooms small quiet comfortable good beds fixtures much offer tv english true everywhere spain hotel restaurant great dinner option couple places within walking distance find something one two meals good location planning longer stay unless going madrid train every day business center pcs old dont even support websites reading web difficult probably ok bring pc free shuttle airport 15 minutes away bottom line good spot overnight early flight late arrival otherwise stay downtown madrid

Reviews.Title: “great location for a great price”
Reviews.Author: lim09Munster
Reviews.Content: wanted give date review seen nothing 2008 stayed sofitel hotel doesnt disappoint beds far best comfy didnt want leave tv decent choice channels room service great hotel service good noone rude booked got queen room bargain one night hotel provides small blue van sofitel novotel side wait every actually every 5 mins one person always picking someone 1015 drive hotel back many people speak english madrid learn spanish perfect location metro staying

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: HJS-2011-08
Reviews.Content: way one night stop madrid stayed hotel good rate 150 night positives 1 subway stop pink line one minute walk 2 free airport shuttle 3 breakfast 26 euros per person negatives 1 even non smoking floors faint cigarette smell 2 staff kind 3 breakfast serves don’t speak english overall recommend hotel early morning flight catch

Reviews.Title: “A good place to stay in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: theshawsfromeccles
Reviews.Content: stayed madrid campo de las hotel week general hotel ok positive negative things positive bed confortable pillow menu tv great breakfast many things choose pool area kindness kind looked children well staff ok good bar negative cleaning service poor light room broken four days music pool little bored rare music time said dont serve drinks pool bar closed restaurants expensive recommend hotel everyone enjoy morning sun swimming pool great experience

Reviews.Title: “dave& sue sprason- brilliant staff nothing too much trouble”
Reviews.Author: davidsprason
Reviews.Content: try stay 4th floor one executive floors luxurious comfortable beds pillow menu great shower shame bath however good location de madrid metro good sofitel experience

Reviews.Title: “Ideally located in the heart of the entertainment area and 5min walk from Central Station”
Reviews.Author: VanessaNarotam
Reviews.Content: left stated reviews nice hotel beds awesome stayed sofitel country customer service standards though one checking ones 3 men behind counter treated though something better ended 3 rooms could less hospitable worst dinner went garden restaurant beautiful well seated ordered 5 us party 3 meals came together 15 minutes later dinner 4 came explanation apology dinner 5 come 15 apology everyone table finished eating received meal trying catch show asked bill immediately waiter left returned turned though day came 2 left 6 couples come us last one served one offered even hint one party went get 2 cabs since time use metro bell man one 15 feet away rest party come immediately bell man began suggesting party better get someone going pay cab great paying 3 rooms 1 cab waiting asked 2 5 get spanish cabs bell man getting us rude spanish male employees time spain 10 days understood culture quite disappointing due attitude male staff accor travel club members remember never stay location even filled complaint say years simply done

Reviews.Title: “Great weekend”
Reviews.Author: JAYS28
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights one directly arriving international flight one directly departing hotel incredibly comfortable staff nice accommodating nice bar downstairs theres corte ingles several restaurants within 10 minute walk comfy beds highly recommended airport hotel

Reviews.Title: “great for city break”
Reviews.Author: 186346Carol
Reviews.Content: frequent madrid visitor usually try stay different hotels time sofitel near airport opinion absolutely best ive stayed several mad airport big comfy soft beds great bath quiet safe staff always luggage every time last sofitel happily supplies every available always clean close airport enough distance significantly higher standards typical box airport hotel booking thru website gives best price easy cancellation policy things change

Reviews.Title: “Great location and nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Andrzejsc
Reviews.Content: booked prepaid rate via sofitel website one night flying madrid chose shuttle ac nonsmoking near airport arrival flight delayed arrived past 1am late shuttle took taxi terminal 4 think took long way round even though know terminal mile least others hotel shuttle terminal 1 next morning much ride promptly time promised desk staff pleasant helpful room held comfortable bed heavy comforter fluffy pillows desk chairs tv closet room overlooked street halls street noise opened window turned ac high fan also pushed lower temp think hot comforter blanket double doors room hallway ensured quiet large bath shower doesnt room agree earlier high step tub dangerous small grab easy also agree hairdryer eventually gets job done didnt spring pricey breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4 Star!!!”
Reviews.Author: casey84
Reviews.Content: great location last night spain want 5 minutes airport free shuttle madrid availability limited one way convenient free shuttle hotel airport took 5 minutes low stress way spend last night flying home hotel room fantastic high end bed bedding large marble bathroom walking distance small mall corte ingles grocery store restaurants also close park business center internet access kind pricey tried print boarding passes couldnt instead refunded 4 euro fee 15 minutes internet usage get internet access room 10 euro day well

Reviews.Title: “Shoddy hotel - don't bother!”
Reviews.Author: Skapole
Reviews.Content: want high class hotel away noise 5 mins airport free shuttle never saw heard single situated new business last weekend busier 5 mins walk 20 mins mentioned part complex outdoor pool free use hotel high well bedrooms feature comfy beds service sweets weather buffet choice hot selection waitress bar restaurant prices stay somewhere classy impressed overall

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location and good facilities but shabby decor”
Reviews.Author: LMurphy2
Reviews.Content: stayed night husband catch flight barajas airport hotel convenient location parking garage extra charge room extremely comfortable wish could packed bed taken back home one issue room little selection order extremely overpriced hotels restaurants werent eateries area certainly isnt place get good meal despite quite pleased room got good nights sleep

Reviews.Title: “Great Central Hotel”
Reviews.Author: rachelwales33
Reviews.Content: convenient comfortable best ive found yet airport area problems concerns thoroughly recommend

Reviews.Title: “great location!”
Reviews.Author: clairelevitt
Reviews.Content: good hotel also wish underground station close takes city center 20 minutes service good stuff friendly electronic key couple times breakfast average expensive 22 eur

Reviews.Title: “Shoddy”
Reviews.Author: Christine B
Reviews.Content: hotel centrally located center dam square jordaan hotel ok nothing special ac middle soft refurb luckily us cold outside sure check making reservation hot also soft refurb add water temperature jump 20 degrees drop 20 hard take relaxing shower

Reviews.Title: “In the heart of Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: catherine191274
Reviews.Content: wife stayed two separate occasions 5 days 3 days stays pleasant hotel staff helpful best part place definately location sits block dam square 20 minute walk almost anywhere didnt use train taxi either stays rooms nice although hotel nonsmoking first stay little bit smell room likely left hotel smoking second stay smell second room stayed renovated went march air conditioning needed noticed process renovated ac system youre travelling summer would something check prior booking overall great experience

Reviews.Title: “Key location, amenities satisfactory”
Reviews.Author: Genevieve B
Reviews.Content: loved hotel rooms nice spacious negative lighting room poor location perfect minutes walk centre would definitely recommend hotel anyone visiting amsterdam easily walk hotel train station ripped taxi driver arrived aware close train station taxi driver drove us around block times charged us 15 euros great hotel great location

Reviews.Title: “Very nice experience”
Reviews.Author: Catherine49680
Reviews.Content: things found wrong spa bath work also tv couldnt turn elderly people stayed would able get dangerous wonderful building square great thanks good time

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly fine for a central stay in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: gemzii89
Reviews.Content: returned 3 night break originally booked cheapest 4 star hotel area wanted liked look internal room quiet ideal light sleeper real view time werent sleeping location ideal main attractions amsterdam palace door step staff friendly helpful rooms clean bar cosy would happy stay

Reviews.Title: “Take this bed to the Torture Museum, they have need of it there!!”
Reviews.Author: MrHays
Reviews.Content: great location room ridiculously small felt like squeezed closet surprisingly bathroom fairly large though loads noise coming inside hotel guests staff seemed like port van cleve pre paid room expedia asked leave deposit like reviews state

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: masha_zec
Reviews.Content: staff friendly little bit stuffy hotel fantastic location decided stay however rooms noisey stayed room faced main road back told noise outside window first night internal rooms available could hear toilet next room doors banging loudly late night said location fantastic price probably wont get anywhere nice stay central close anne frank house main shopping area red light district madame amsterdam canals tram stops dont expect peaceful night

Reviews.Title: “Die Port Van Cleve - great location”
Reviews.Author: Lotte_ladybird
Reviews.Content: arrived early hoped leave bags book later allowed check early fantastic 24 hours travelling first room smelled cigarettes moved immediately another room overlooked st bit noisy trams mind much big supermarket next door handy plenty trams nearby locations

Reviews.Title: “Overdue for a makeover”
Reviews.Author: truview
Reviews.Content: friendly helpful staff comfortable room top included 4 night stay would certainly chose hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, shame about the rooms”
Reviews.Author: plod1127
Reviews.Content: hotel situated 10 minutes amsterdam central station dam square perfect location room comfortable clean completely adequate night stay hotel clean staff friendly efficient would definitely use breakfast wasnt included expensive little cafes coffee bars around hotel quiet even though main road

Reviews.Title: “Centrally located but poor otherwise”
Reviews.Author: pdid
Reviews.Content: stayed feb group 8 girls found hotel excellent location dam square anyone looking central nightlife culture amsterdam offer anne franks house van gogh museum expect see visit doorstep staff polite helpful bar often missing waiter drinks table service wait order also pay third floor room 3 friends warm spacious large bathroom however friends suite 6th floor also spacious quiet cold

Reviews.Title: “What you see is NOT what you get”
Reviews.Author: tatirlima
Reviews.Content: amsterdam times best hotel stayed value money last time went stayed 5 star hotel die port van cleve half price 5 star location better need weekend break visit fantastic city

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location, Good Service, Average Rooms”
Reviews.Author: sambo_1986
Reviews.Content: returned 3 night stay die port van cleve hotel reading reviews hotel little stay however pleased say stay pleasant location hotel great yes rooms small least one single wardrobe 5 coat hangers store clothes us living suitcase always important issue disappointed although toilet could done drop view room rooms bother us much sure room front building would better spoil stay reception staff helpful polite gave us plenty advice bar clean nice place sit quiet drink evening polite helpful staff eat hotel feel prices rather high find small steak resturant called el look honest surprised good value steak meal good sized portion served smile dont let put usual tourist things last day took bus tour amsterdam several things would like visited run time tip would tour first day first visit amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: StevensFam
Reviews.Content: pleasant hotel good location close dam square attractions amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: caligrace
Reviews.Content: husband often go amsterdam stay hotels one far welcoming first room given small desk changed later evening problem 2nd rm brilliant staff extremely polite showed get amsterdam tram tickets etc staff found wedding anniversary two free glasses immediately ordered young man bar interesting told us local buildings palace road history hotel etc proud share knowledge home town even though stayed 4 days staff greeted us like old friends every time came went hotel asked us good day going night would definately stay would ask front room bigger

Reviews.Title: “AVOID THIS HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: JacquiB34
Reviews.Content: 4 star hotel ideally located within easy walking distance central station nightlife plaza mall next door great shopping boutique stores rooms decent size bathrooms small clean hotel quaint site original heineken brewery trams make amsterdam easily accessible breakfasts nice well terms variety quality morning leaving took 630 airport shuttle 16 euros breakfast started 630 6am asked could get juice pastries something lady restaurant rudely told us paid breakfast airport hotel took train central station 4 euros took number 5 tram stopped right outside hotel dam square stop u considering using train travel light

Reviews.Title: “Good location but not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: dinoHampshire
Reviews.Content: found amsterdam days looking place stay members christmas leave location hotel us first well appearance however front desk turned almost immediately simple pricing possibility discount met attitude told discounts unusual netherlands maybe look canada want discount said thank left immediately perhaps made us look little cheap tastes never even think going next hotel called one stayed hotel arena offered us discount ended awesome stay

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here”
Reviews.Author: Redhillrunner
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night p mini cruise december 8th great location 10 minute walk ferry bus drop cross road supermarket along included package wouldnt pay extra buffet style lots cafes spacious 2 levels overlooking main street able leave luggage day arrival got room location short break would stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location, decent enough hotel, would stay again”
Reviews.Author: rebeccaj5622
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 times different trips price gone service gone location hard beat staff breakfast euros good hope find better place next stay city amsterdam one top 50 citys world alas van cleve apart visit longer

Reviews.Title: “Poorer than average”
Reviews.Author: Ted023
Reviews.Content: well booking hotel thought right great location looking outside went well got room reception outside lovely firstly got given room seemed basement go tiny steep stairs find 3 rooms fire escape walls ceilings paper thin felt like going fall shabby definetly 4 star moved rooms better still quite small dark luxurious also fridge plus side plus side bed comfy prime location ironing room ironing dress wanted wear like said great location stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice Charm”
Reviews.Author: shoeguyUSA
Reviews.Content: upon first entering room discovered tiny tiny cat certainly could without hitting head appeared part attic considering booked many months requested room view dam square disappointing say least went reception ask rooms awful said full considering thursday night early december find hard believe staff unhelpful asked managers name refused give thought bit odd said could talk morning came going problem room much bigger cupboard night stayed larger boat end bother moving tired 3 days anyway decided put staffs attitude disappointing room hotel two doors room leading attic space around cold making room cold room quite tired looking particularly clean normally room maids friendly one saw sour one morning went make cup tea found put one clean tray leaving old dirty one day hotel bar closed 1030pm night go outside drink lots bars open seems bit odd close early location good half minute dam square dont mind poor quality room etc ok overall hotel unfriendly staff small room view best thing hotel reception counter quite hotel room 110 1010 says

Reviews.Title: “Itchy”
Reviews.Author: Roger580419
Reviews.Content: hotel ideally located city centre short walk centraal train station right next tram stop adjacent shopping centre stones throw dam square red light district quiet room overlooked internal courtyard hotel many rooms face onto busy main road incredibly busy arrived room ready however hotel provided luggage storage room keep luggage arrived room ready also store luggage day departure hotel staff friendly happy provide info local area room clean dated walls marked furniture lamp broken tv rarely seemed respond remote matress 2 huge people slept difficult sleep comfortably without rolling definitely comparable would normally expect 4 hotel think high cost paying perfect location stayed basic double room cost us euros 2 nights id stay city break business trip holiday friends would recommend luxury honeymoon hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not as we expected”
Reviews.Author: BARBARAHartlepool
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights twin room looks outside actually rooms really clean fresh bright shower bath hair dryer bathroom bedroom large window neat table chair set front kettle provided along tea bags coffees room back hotel facing onto university never disturbed always welcome cold winter staff really friendly always happy help directions trams great location right centre tram stops right outside

Reviews.Title: “Not up to our standards”
Reviews.Author: WAYZATA55
Reviews.Content: colleague stayed one night following business conference checkin efficient staff friendly room small basic perfectly adequate short stay clean beds comfortable experienced noise either main street guests breakfast nice best selling point hotel location close dam square 510 minutes walk centraal station personally would rate hotel 3 4 would definitely recommend base explore amsterdam end day city break would using hotel sleep shower spend day room

Reviews.Title: “I need another stay for my b-day this year.”
Reviews.Author: AMSTERDAMGRETCHEN
Reviews.Content: booked hotel part cruise package arrived greeted surly receptionist best disinterested us honeymoon asked given nice room would expected 4 anyway room given basic small ugly window faced wall wardrobe couldnt use blocked desk light switch behind one pillows breakfast morning poor assume juice food best would class 3 thats generous assume base star rating lobby rather hotel whole location square round corner coach pickup point wont staying

Reviews.Title: “Perfection”
Reviews.Author: youngmid
Reviews.Content: amsterdam would really good place stay right centre city hotel self looks like 4 star outside however rooms small could open bathroom door without banging bed basic clean staff helpful breakfasts good dinner bar one night food service brilliant

Reviews.Title: “Great location, history, bar, restaurant- shame about the room!”
Reviews.Author: jampat69
Reviews.Content: back stay time room still undergoing soft refurb air con room hot room card stated blue room meant pillow cases bed cover still tired old furniture problem last time small wardrobe shelf small desk clothes went bottom wardrobe luckily staying would problem two people yet pretty good bathroom free rooms great location star rating go position alone reading recent positive reviews rooms vary said try get one inside view also means noise outside rooms double glazed

Reviews.Title: “Past it's heyday, but pretty clean and spacious. Good service.”
Reviews.Author: Traveler0987654321
Reviews.Content: stayed die port van cleve late september 2011 room small clean comfortable staff friendly helpful buffet breakfast included price room offered lot variety seemed expensive saw expensive city bar attractive location good public transportation short walk away lot shops restaurants nearby food market block away able buy snacks drinks complaint fair amount street noise night part central location

Reviews.Title: “character hotel, good location”
Reviews.Author: ripejack
Reviews.Content: colleague recently returned 1 night stay hotel stay work convention river cruise reading poor reviews must say really rather surprised guests rated hotel badly understand hotel probably suited 3 plus rather 4 however believe star rating based location anything hotel easy find dam square hotel reception efficient helpful stayed room much view window however dark arrived anyway room provided adequate facilites functional fairly modern bathroom beds comfy free wifi guests public areas main english channels television breakfast restaurant reception floor perfectly adequate fill lunch offering toast scrambled egg bacon sausage continental cheese etc hotel helpful store luggage store room checked didnt around city rest day absolutely loved amsterdam would certainly recommend hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Basic but Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Pinklix
Reviews.Content: stayed young couple amsterdam hotel fab location literally dam square right middle everything rooms great clean spacious back room looking onto road behind beds world fussy comfort faulted everything kept clean receptionists always happy help whatever need thing say let hotel breakfast put load rubbish worth extortionate price charge alot selection booked breakfast arrived made sound like would paying 15 euro 3 days worked 35 euro u go breakfast check make sound cheap likely aint location u plenty places grab breakfast faulted would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “weekend away”
Reviews.Author: ivan1962
Reviews.Content: hotel location central near dam square hence reason booking via hotels website 6 months prior visit paying time booking wanted use visit say good thank colleagues arrival hotel told us despite confirmed reservation full rooms however booked us sister hotel would pay taxis get us sister hotel 25 minute taxi ride centre town near airport end long business day tired option agree terms ruined trip colleagues polite obviously disappointed dinner town spent 125 hours taxis night impressions first time hotel done help sell rooms less located sister hotel confirmed rooms e 2 weeks prior travel details could turned night excuse eyes let customers beware booking paying front always get pay expect stay somewhere else deserve business treat customers way

Reviews.Title: “Great location-Great bartender-Faisal”
Reviews.Author: landsick
Reviews.Content: seen 4 star hotel expected lot building beautiful lobby nice rooms best mediocre extremely small rooms booked 2 could barely walk end bed desk get window side bed bathrooms hand huge big couldnt reach toilet paper toilet opposite wall good 2 meters away practical also ventilation bathrooms smelling pretty musty rated 3 star hotel would perfectly fine said expected said location perfect everything within walking distance want snack theres great supermarket 2 minutes walk street also easy get station airport

Reviews.Title: “Good location.”
Reviews.Author: truckassessor
Reviews.Content: location hotel good situated close many city centre attractions staff could helpful pleasant breakfast good expect bacon eggs set us day however room stayed although roomy way bathroom especially clean tiles leaving wall places radiator bedroom walls black suitcases dirty summary going short stay view main attractions amsterdam hotel ideal location happy room complain sure staff would ready help

Reviews.Title: “4 Star Hotel - I don,t think so!!!”
Reviews.Author: DaveMarr
Reviews.Content: location hotel 2nd none behind palace dam square front hotel lovely nice clean modern looking reception friendly helpful staff thats stops like amsterdam hotels stayed general theme appears top class looking exterior small looking musty smelling rooms need 3 4 star hotel despite description rooms nice hotel unless planning spend lots time room would recommend hotel book room reasonable price

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Hotel - Centrally Located”
Reviews.Author: Andrew F
Reviews.Content: hotel quick 10 minute walk amsterdam central station 20 minutes 5 euros schiphol airport train hotels central location thing hotel going many shops restaurants cafes located walking distance hotel also offers free wifi access front desk service good reached hotel made wait entire hour room building ancient elevators really slow entire hotel undergoing soft renovations air conditioning working ok early october long keep window open however rooms windows make sure one windows sleep quality hotel poor twin beds uncomfortable noise street quite loud till least 1am morning breakfast restaurant plain average cost euro 19 poor value money would stay next visit amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant Hotel”
Reviews.Author: cocomac89
Reviews.Content: website lovely exciting even close reality room small could see mould bathroom ceiling staff specially front desk definitely friendly exception made one man one really efficient know ask information person like youre asking big favor well thats make feel moment arrive location good im sure youll find place better neighborhood

Reviews.Title: “Great location for exploring city centre on foot”
Reviews.Author: ctimes2
Reviews.Content: stayed die port van cleve hotel 3 nights august 2010 hotel located behind dam square tram stop directly outside location hotel great within easy reach mins walk bars shops dam square area 5 minute walk main train station whilst hotel supposedly middle upgrading airconditioning unfortunately aircon work time year made rooms hot hotel advertised free wireless internet although connection hotels internet free wireless plug ethernet cable laptop connect internet disappointment good selection english tv channels bbc minibar fridge room also disappointment public areas hotel beautifully furnished restaurant bar also nice however found hotel room stayed little tired shabby terms furnishings

Reviews.Title: “wow.wow.wow!!!”
Reviews.Author: foxylola
Reviews.Content: chose air france holiday services stay hotel second year row room 2nd floor 6th one main difference could open window without fan would uncomfortable said clean staff extremely friendly helpful buffet breakfast good selection something everyone attached bar warm friendly fun drink hotel walking distance train station located block dam good shopping cute cafes yes tram goes right front hotel prefer stay room hotel front hear see everything going including sounds tram

Reviews.Title: “Great location, awful room”
Reviews.Author: golferdeluxe
Reviews.Content: thing budget accommodation price airconditioning didnt work doors half painted furniture chipped smelly left sofa bed room small extremely noisy unpleasant said front office staff friendly somewhat although promised get back us information twice didnt restaurant serves great food prepared wait help menus ask take order practically take money serving us disappeared twice trying pay odd

Reviews.Title: “OK hotel”
Reviews.Author: Minttu-83
Reviews.Content: hotel general fine isnt 4 hotel staff polite helpful room quite big massive lack light tiny lamp whole room anyway bathroom pretty big view facing royal nice noisy sometimes said hotel fine expensive

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: DawnIain
Reviews.Content: tram stopped right outside 10 minute walk central station great central location sightseeing amsterdam hotel staff nice helpful even answering emails english giving us loads information even tram numbers food lovely feel little extra paid hotel compared others worth central location friendly staff good food cleanliness facilities rooms nice comfortable view wasnt best friends great rooms even free internet computer lobby handy print boarding passes flights staff happy bit unfortunate lift order air conditioning also broken bar closed early busy good job expensive anyway rest amsterdam would definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Alright, good location”
Reviews.Author: emmalouisemonaghan
Reviews.Content: rooms stayed 34 times last three years im still little reluctant recommend room recently room worst yet positives new bathroom excellent shower lovely comfortable bed negatives really tired furniture narrow wardrobe bedside table long writing desk wasnt enough room placed partly window one wall left gap inches bottom bed double glazing room overlooking street back hotel air conditioning isnt working hotel refurbished mid september hope refurbishment aspects sure hotel 4 compare hotel hundred yards away also 4 guess ill writing desk could result states rooms 4 one get good price go lower 4 expectations case rooms like mine somewhere hotels seem forget good link first stay would gone back

Reviews.Title: “great location !”
Reviews.Author: lynsey3
Reviews.Content: smallest hotel room ever stayed double say thank god partner swing cat without prior warning hotel decided upgrade airconditioning system end june currently sat room pool shower asked fan told none left hotel needs serious updating reception staff advise prepared stand long time even acknowledged stayed cheaper hotels amsterdam million times better

Reviews.Title: “Very Good 3 Star "Red Roof-ish" Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Buquing
Reviews.Content: four star standard superior room lacked sufficient drawer space clothes lifts slow air conditioning work warm weekend breakfasts average

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, decent hotel”
Reviews.Author: maggietravelista89
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect location hotel lot charm real dutch experience rooms fine grab executive superior room wish bar classic dutch great place cold heineken instead complaints people try enjoy take charm much pleasure city

Reviews.Title: “Hotel that has has great location but let down by its rooms and few staff"”
Reviews.Author: ady_mills
Reviews.Content: spent nights noise trams street stop midnight started early next morning chipped glasses thin towels toiletries

Reviews.Title: “smelly”
Reviews.Author: fraher
Reviews.Content: hotel like 3 star booked superior room mini bar fridge mentioned write room given front hotel thought great tried sleep discovered trams ran 600 first night sleep asked moved quiet room promptly assume rooms available guests checked morning next room superior room double bed two single beds pushed together made singles bath stained gentleman uses electric find point bathroom well husband wet also hairdryer situated bathroom would allowed uk safety reasons one good point bar excellant barman even remembered four drinks first night point hotel central april tulip gardens really must

Reviews.Title: “The only good thing about this place is its location - avoid at all costs!”
Reviews.Author: Travelling_Skunk
Reviews.Content: hotel leaves lot desired upon arrival impressed facade lobby charm ended room smelled smoke one two chairs narrow desk place put clothes suitcase based decision stay ratings site recommendation dont stay stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “absoute satisfaction.”
Reviews.Author: fainaj
Reviews.Content: realized today 5 months since trip amsterdam birthday november 2010 go back birthday november 2011 definately staying die port van cleve last stay like family made feel extra special since traveling city amsterdam staff bar food wonderful loved soaking tub even wine one nice chairs room treated like family next stay smoking room want enjoy room time like true amsterdam cant wait love service wonderful people work cant say enough

Reviews.Title: “not 4* but a very good 3* good location helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: samφll
Reviews.Content: daughter stayed three nights twin room encountered drab decor also shabby appearance clean pillows cheap lumpy type duvet thin room looked wall 15 away lighting totally dressing table mirror also drawers bed lights immediately head would sat reading fridge room either bathroom basic three chips basin cheap plastic bath cracked really cheap could understood wasnt would complained took three phone calls get extra pillow given nature dutch thought keep quiet said enjoyed amsterdam next time going 5 star 4

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Marnie09
Reviews.Content: bit apprehensive reviews mixed would stay weekend break site original heineken brewery building lovely cool charming bar downstairs restaurant excellent great location handy everything spent money rooms would fantastic weekend break tired decor two single beds pushed together double bed made single beds toilets fine though tv safe kettle etc 14 us staying weekend perfect putting head meeting bar etc probably families people wanting classy room

Reviews.Title: “Good Location but a good 3* not 4*...”
Reviews.Author: Cloggy8
Reviews.Content: stayed one superior suites facing de window directly entrance first left photo particular room spacious also saw one regular rooms tiny definitely something keep mind making reservation room clean except two chairs impressive stains rest furniture clean well kept also couple cigarette side bath tub bathroom nothing special adequate definitely didnt like hand soap sheets towels spotless staff immaculate part reason room service didnt replace shampoo bottles ran ask front desk problems whatsoever overall id say hotel may past room pretty clean spacious service good wouldnt mind coming back

Reviews.Title: “I think you can get better for the money”
Reviews.Author: Graysautos
Reviews.Content: die port van cleve amsterdam plenty character well located minutes centraal station close dam square hotel bedrooms roomy perfectly acceptable base trip breakfast original home heineken brewery bar pleasant indeed better option across street sofitel hotel american hotel wouldnt select die port van cleve business romantic trip

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Alaska_Lola
Reviews.Content: visited hotel birthday trip husband booked reasonable decided pay upgrade well arrival hotel dealt efficient male receptionist given directions room even helped us book trip canals night trip served cheese wine trip cheap got 34 cheeses couple glasses wine beware getting room although clean climb would call stairs steep narrow left us glad cases bigger also fire would stood chance would comment room quiet stretch would called room upgrade beer least 1 euro pubs outside worth going walk also little supermarket left discover quite late break breakfast worth shopping around also loads eateries reasonable

Reviews.Title: “Not a four star hotel”
Reviews.Author: jaygeemack
Reviews.Content: nice hotel little bit tired really central location breakfast expensive 12 50

Reviews.Title: “Close to everything, friendly/helpful staff, all the amenities”
Reviews.Author: bassgrrl
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights enjoy hotel well located dam square shopping center building nice well staff polite friendly breakfast hoped mean standard good rooms good little bit old small well maintained good soundproofing kind comfortable clearly weak spot hotel nevertheless donâ€™t mind going back

Reviews.Title: “Unclean, cramped and dingy”
Reviews.Author: Jones_ro
Reviews.Content: stayed four nights 17th feb say hotel average im trying think something good write come good central location far railway station

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Vinegarhill
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel around ten years ago great money spent time early check 2pm asked room ready early could get told matter time room ready could get key 2pm receptionist never cracked smile never bothered greet us way carpets thread bare worn room tiny furniture worn covered bathroom would expect 1 2 star hotel dirty round bath shower went freezing hot without dangerous children toiletries joke 4 star hotel one cheap body wash shower cap check handled well last friendly staff two nights say would want stay longer found expensive never would rated four hotel one hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location, but no frills hotel”
Reviews.Author: SPclaire
Reviews.Content: recently stayed die port van cleve one night recently rates good comparison hotels city centre hotel undergoing refurbishment whilst staying negative signs halls new carpets room air con really needed time year refurb completed end march staff friendly checkin stored bags arrived early explained refurb gave us vouchers free drinks 25 bar even though work didnt affect us rooms nice inside flatscreen tvs free wifi nice added extra staff helpful checkout stored bags afternoon needed would recommend hotel others stay returning amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4 star hotel - probably 2!!! Overpriced, dirty and tiny rooms”
Reviews.Author: MaverickMat
Reviews.Content: visited die port van cleve valentines weekend staff friendly helpful room clean location perfect amsterdam approx 2 minutes walk dam square ate hotel twice dinner lovely bar dutch tasty even though renovations going office hours stay heard nothing lovely hotel go back amsterdam definite staying

Reviews.Title: “Oh Dear - put this lady out of her misery”
Reviews.Author: NLBatEBR
Reviews.Content: didnt know expect given mixed reviews hotel process refurbished floor floor however noise work due completed early 2011 room recently painted clean spend much time hotel used base explore city staff helpful friendly

Reviews.Title: “In Danish standards this would be a nice 3 star hotel.”
Reviews.Author: AnoukW
Reviews.Content: 9 asked come back 1pm left luggage went hit coffee bars eventually checked 3pm got upgraded reason room big clean comfy beds lovely bathroom else could ask perfect ask iron key laundry room use iron could fault room hotel self breakfast wow variety choose fish goes valentines ate resturant given 25 voucher use try read bad views hotel lovely clean friendly staff amsterdam called lost couple best weekend away coffee shops etc must go green place also another coffee shop soon come hotel turn left chinese coffee try strong enjoy

Reviews.Title: “awfull”
Reviews.Author: sweetfan
Reviews.Content: chose van cleve located one street away dam plaza find restaurants coffee shops shopping plus easy access tram routes van cleve well located service hotel excellent friendly desk clerks also bar restaurant rooms thats goes heating bathrooms ever try open fridge door take shower well thats exactly feel like room small normal guess beds cheap cleanliness hallways vacuumed least month would stay return amsterdam would pay little extra room live

Reviews.Title: “Great location and decent no-frills hotel”
Reviews.Author: tonymunch
Reviews.Content: little bit disappointed expected better hotel room ok slightly dirty breakfast ok

Reviews.Title: “What a dump!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: 5starAussies
Reviews.Content: central location hotel excellent attractions within walking distance like walk tram stops outside entrance reception warm room huge singles set together shower hot powerful also bath sitting area flat screen bbc breakfast included good excellent staff taken husband celebrate 50th birthday husband told hotel advance presented free drink voucher 25 discount dinner good best attraction lit cruise unlimited wine cheeses anne frank one ice bar well worth visit

Reviews.Title: “Maybe not a 4*”
Reviews.Author: avalon72
Reviews.Content: hotel fine bit shabby needed somewhere put heads days okay excellent time amsterdam see soon

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant location”
Reviews.Author: Rub3s
Reviews.Content: loved staying amazing location nice sized room sadly view room room character well split level could quite dated clean check given map man hotel us else asked nice friendly went way help us reading reviews prepared seems steep especially mention fee booked didnt eat restaurant cant comment place looked beautiful alot time spent room goes amsterdam stay nice hotel going back

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Small Room, Kind of Smelled, Pretty Good Value”
Reviews.Author: Nati_Traveler1
Reviews.Content: people wouldnt call 4 star european location youd want stay spacious bigger expected found bathroom rate think got good breakfast ripoff wasnt good distant one girl front desk seemed enjoy stay

Reviews.Title: “Will not book again”
Reviews.Author: JulieJooles25
Reviews.Content: hotel great location truly makes yet wouldnt consider 4 star hotel many charming spacious room bathroom needed update ancient hair dryer bath tub seemed less chic also front desk truly helpful amsterdam visitors hoping guided advice places eat tours take

Reviews.Title: “Location,Location,Location”
Reviews.Author: sally 21
Reviews.Content: first trip amsterdam treat girlfriend chose 4 hotel special birthday surprise snow ground slightly worried delayed flights getting stuck couple days another country without hotel room decided book travel agent pay 3 nights bb flights arrival hotel really impressed check however slightly credit card charged cover may stay hands credit card department money taken without arrival room really see small room double bed pushed wall every bit floor space taken either chairs could sit floor side bed put shoes due lack space room looked like single double bed put top matters room must smoking room one stage ceiling walls yellow bathroom much better 7 outside would liked heat however radiator half hanging could get turn put door put first morning housekeeping however simply placed back room every day action taken fix problems second day girlfriend came back room forgot camera got back room door wide open housekeeping left wide open anyone else come please finished good thing hotel bar staff way meant serve meals run bar keep bar keep bar clean well serving coffee reception time think way star system amsterdam compared uk possibly die port van cleve hotel may three star rather four star

Reviews.Title: “good location in historic building”
Reviews.Author: romanova1
Reviews.Content: superior double two singles pushed enough bedding cold first thing awful smell room like hanging one curtain hanging could sit toilet properly enough room front sit really shame great hotel lots

Reviews.Title: “Good location, but.....”
Reviews.Author: jimmylonghurst
Reviews.Content: daughter boyfriend stayed hotel 2 nights arrival asked leave deposit 100 euros large spending money upset greatly contacted lastminute wasnt advised website credit firstly contacted hotel got deposit reduced 50 euros secondly said would reported followed contacted hotel directly told every hotel world takes deposit well dont much helpful staff top hotel poor room small

Reviews.Title: “Easy to find, good location”
Reviews.Author: Phewtorquay
Reviews.Content: cant find centrally located hotel amazingly reasonable staff friendly helpful personal approach always find nice word joke tips

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel-Good location”
Reviews.Author: Couple_asking_info
Reviews.Content: reading reviews booked bit arrival hotel lobby reception really plush rooms could room quite spacious clean friendly helpful location 1 min walk dam square

Reviews.Title: “Great location, staff, rooms and yeah, almost everything was great!”
Reviews.Author: Cucumber021
Reviews.Content: perfectly located hotel walking every direction lovely amsterdam staff friendly helpful breakfast buffet large dr windows street enough selections fill us day sightseeing room adequate size comfortable clean could use reading night would complaint definitely stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Don't believe the negative reviews”
Reviews.Author: WhistlingGypsy
Reviews.Content: second time stayed hotel last time 7 years ago first time girlfriend time friend running marathon location ideal right dam square 5 minute walk central station one arrival forgotten nice hotel looks outside especially night lit reception cant say welcomed staff could lot friendly check didnt take long pointed lift room room decent size two comfy good sized single beds tv coffeetea facilities safe bathroom clean nice size problem room freezing maids always left window open night radiator didnt work didnt book breakfast hotel wanted pp per day bar quite nice quiet life didnt know hotel old heineken brewery depending going amsterdam hotel minutes walk red light district bars stop right outside hotel take leidseplein beyond side royal palace another 16 stop take rembrandt square shopping centre next hotel supermarket 400 yards past park nice worth walk round dont forget giant also fancy somewhere cheap eat find palace called burger delicious freshly made would use hotel price right

Reviews.Title: “Hotel with a lot of history but service a little slow”
Reviews.Author: DerbyboyTurvesUK
Reviews.Content: arrived happy staff reception really happy help got room middle hotel room bit dark nice clean bed two singles put together fine one thing would say two pillows much say like pillows went window opened curtains saw massive ventilation system making right beyond rooms view either reason didnt ask room change two days thought wasnt worth hotel isnt four star three reason van cleve gets 4 great location lift

Reviews.Title: “Avoid This Hotel”
Reviews.Author: jbaflyer
Reviews.Content: booked hotel expedia fantastic deal hotel easy find short walk train station arrived early morning hotel staff kept luggage wandered around street albert heijn find food wine take back room want loved going beer wine nights bed staff friendly breakfast wonderful liked hotel much booked another 2 nights upon arrival back amsterdam hotel short walk red light district flower market room small expected europe cute loved beds clean comfy

Reviews.Title: “not a good hotel do not stay there if you are a family”
Reviews.Author: seldamanawi
Reviews.Content: hotel ranked four star room small beds seen better days location good central amsterdam said

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location near Dam Square”
Reviews.Author: NJphotoGuy
Reviews.Content: loved hotel close everything comfortable staff extremely helpful friendly amenities covered would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Very decent & well positioned.”
Reviews.Author: costaspal
Reviews.Content: rooms dirty cramped shabby much furniture small room squeeze get door past bed carpets filthy rooms hallways mold shower tiles bedding worn thin threadbare cigarette bathroom fixtures nonsmoking room bed fluffy staff ok particularly helpful bar downstairs closed one day reason restaurant open breakfast lunch virtually empty us eat promised wifi available except hotel lobby real disappointment city literally hundreds small hotels recommended

Reviews.Title: “Great location, slightly dirty rooms.”
Reviews.Author: jessicafred
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel impressed last time ask room change last time booked know location well knew going expensive convention hike prices 100 euros night add nothing extra breakfast still 19 euros mcdonalds minute walk away real issue got say wifi useless works lobby even bar free wifi internet though internet e room cable via tv use ipad smart phone rooms small fair go walk watch sites close central tram stop right outside hotel

Reviews.Title: “\great Location”
Reviews.Author: alice43Southport
Reviews.Content: great location centre town easy walking distance everything staff reception friendly rooms tiny basic bathroom pretty night room boiling hot aircon ceiling fan windows could open crack

Reviews.Title: “Die port van cleve”
Reviews.Author: MissGaGa
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights last leg journey paris booked 4 stars hotels cities hotel amsterdam turned nightmare first night stay dingy double bed room fan made much noise could hardly sleep next day got room changed entering found one lamp three worked room slightly bigger though previous one entered greeted big hair bathroom wall us requested reception clean left dinner upon return hair still bathroom smell well called reception requested get cleaned lady reception told us cleaned invited room look saw apologised next day manager apologised well trip ruined spent fortune staying hotel total waste money hotel good location quite central needs refurbishment seriously needs standards 4 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Over-rated”
Reviews.Author: Scalf
Reviews.Content: 3 persons room big enough furniture full dirty spots everywhere personal tried really hard help really poor drinks fridge passed date max 3

Reviews.Title: “Great location, 3 star standard”
Reviews.Author: LondonTravelAgent
Reviews.Content: booking hotel read reviews concerned going like positive experience booked room two single beds got one beds pushed together thing promised given new towels everyday changed room cleaned window turning away street quit visited hotel 30 degrees outside warm even nights wasnt hotel never promised would doesnt say website windows could easily keep windows open night without bothered anything staff helpfull directions almost anything asked luggage stored 6 hours checkout problems also read said rooms smelled funny didnt positive experience certainly returning next visit amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “MOUSE IN OUR ROOM”
Reviews.Author: delly25
Reviews.Content: booked payed advance double room got room tiny single one went back reception gave key another room got room couple bed another trip reception third room fine start tried use phone went pop tv fourth room ok great ok later night thought would order meal room service four phone calls later still answer phoned reception complain put room service yes youve answer hotel great location ill never stay normally stay nh hotels much better

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant location”
Reviews.Author: passengerinthenight
Reviews.Content: must admit reading lot reviews site booked hotel really worried going get tiny rooms shabby dirty windows didnt open showers didnt work etc etc dont usually write reviews hotels certainly wouldnt bother complaining surprised turned last week great place stay would say 4 probably bit nowhere near bad people saying decent 3 problem reception staff great hotel room bedding towels clean bathroom spotless beds comfortable windows definately open theres lot said size rooms maybe little small side sleeping getting ready rooms fine ive really happy hotel would definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Nothing special”
Reviews.Author: Klemensito
Reviews.Content: recommended us four star quality access executive room go concrete steps small hall room filthy couch torn worn airconditioning tiny fan two single beds double disgusting poor value money

Reviews.Title: “enjoyable stay with good dutch character”
Reviews.Author: lovetocookMoray
Reviews.Content: booked hotel thought pictures looked good mostly good reviews walk lobby look 4 receptionist polite stored bags could check check got room well im afraid wasnt quite 4 hoped safe tea coffee facilities promised bed comfortable problems hair dryer hot air hand dryer best long hair im glad took draw space live case luggage rack mine floor one mirror full length use took wall placed suitable area ie room entrance door tv worked bathroom clean although shower although hot seen better days jet opposed shower website stated bar open wasnt closed discovered bad 4 probably wouldnt stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: NorthYorksFoxy
Reviews.Content: think hotel right need amsterdam brilliant location dam square rooms right size clean shower worked pretty good beds comfy

Reviews.Title: “Not Worth its * Rating - Didn't Quite Get This Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Amandamanx
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 2 nights first week may absolutely loved location selected read reviews took reviews seemed pretty spot us great location smaller room kind smelled like party lobby great everyone definitely price location minimal amount time actually hotel strong smelling bought got us pretty comfortable recommendation comes hoping stay hotel budget would recommend im sure could find something better equally good location price great time

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: jhammett17
Reviews.Content: great location right dam turned 30 mins early check said room ready please come back arrived back took ages check us even say lovely room given well got room 2nd floor funny smell opened door dropped going spend run superior room shouldnt given 1 star twin beds asked double oh well tv nearly every channel needed paying euros day view air unit needed look saw sky complained asked move better room said fully booked please ask tomorrow morning still said fully booked say would never go side twin beds really comfortable bathroom ok safe room

Reviews.Title: “I Will Never Stay There Again”
Reviews.Author: Traveler00173
Reviews.Content: booked hotel amsterdam airport tourist information centre paid euros per night walked hotel central station took 10 cant fault location hotel hotel looking building check slow people marina receptionist girl check also took ages room facing front hotel 5th could hear road noise window open needed window open day room coffee maker flat screen clean nice clean usual toiletries breakfast one morning hotel nice expensive 20 euros per person good hotel great location slow unhappy reception staff

Reviews.Title: “A Poor Choice”
Reviews.Author: Jas046
Reviews.Content: good location accross dome square good value money

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: hil68
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights got deal thought pretty good time location perfect right behind palace dam square near jordaan rooms perfect first room end corridor fire escape room tiny dingy smoke moved room nonsmoking small safe work desk unit falling apart bathroom decent could done shower bar lovely space bar didnt seem want us seemed like forever 5mins werent served went elsewhere hotel markets 4 really would struggle get 3 city facade beautiful certainly arent

Reviews.Title: “Not my idea of a 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: vanmunchen
Reviews.Content: hotel staff courteous helpful room clean though small problem guests extremely loud late night management happy help quiet

Reviews.Title: “A very good experience”
Reviews.Author: Michael15
Reviews.Content: great location 5 minutes walk central station albert supermarket shopping centre post office almost adjacent pub nice restaurant food extra breakfast order stay 18 take historic building clean friendly front desk staff spacious rooms flat screen tv mattress little soft ok suggest go

Reviews.Title: “Unbelievably BAD.... dont darken the door”
Reviews.Author: BrucieS
Reviews.Content: hotel extremely welcoming bit going read past reviews boyfriend went january enjoyed helpful directions anything needed hotel 5 mins walk anne franks house hotel dam square 10 mins across road main shopping district good quiet location didnt experience dirt road noise room front hotel overlooking road standard room nice spacious central station 1015 mins walk straight opposite front central station would recommend hotel anyone booked go back july didnt eat food smelt good locals would usually bar restaurant would add bringing alcohol room outside dont buy local shops large supermarket downstairs come hotel turn left 3 mins walk traffic lights drink cheaper anywhere else think called something hope helps

Reviews.Title: “awful bedrooms, wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: Boblin
Reviews.Content: amsterdam last weekend great time service personal warm especially reception staff attentive always right suggestion make sure know amsterdam explained lot hotel checked usually hotels ask spent already weekend amsterdam hotels next time come back one rooms bit outdated clean fine rate paid location perfect special breakfast offer however surprisingly restaurant doesnt toaster big deal really dont understand people could write negative reviews hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel would recommend-(ask for 5th floor.)”
Reviews.Author: LordMemnoch
Reviews.Content: pictures might look good reality totally different story paid thought going superior regular rooms one elevator working slow took stairs times say inconvenient hotel lobby smelled stale smoke room disappointing say least first floor ground floor navigate luggage half wide enough suitcase stairs even wide enough feet half floor road loud noisy night add freezing night since cannot adjust temperature room slept fully stay warm much extra money paid superior room wasnt superior wasnt even dont stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location, small rooms”
Reviews.Author: dimitra12000
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 previous occasions mainly history hotel location executive rooms friendly staff good food lovely restaurant time visit nightmare booked way advance hotel direct via internet site executive double husband superior room single requested rooms 3rd floor booking confirmed e arrived given tiny dark room first floor complained moved room 2nd floor also dark small window faced brick wall centre building consequently room noisy told superior rooms available 3rd floor day monday could possibly move point arguing time man desk unhelpful next complaint previous visits porters assist luggage husband disabled none 4 days hotel member staff offered help also explanation blue bar one features hotel closed monday evening day night historic restaurant also closed explanation told could eat blue bar open feel pay restaurant prices meal served public bar wooden tables uncomfortable chairs ate instead sum time hotel service appalling apart one young man reception corridors smelt badly drains see van parked outside hotel price rooms way high compared local hotels considering low standard hotel advertised 4 star returning hotel ever sad true

Reviews.Title: “Excellent staff, value and location”
Reviews.Author: DCMark
Reviews.Content: stayed dei port van cleve early november 2009 good location right centre opposite dam square arrival didnâ€™t room booked us double booked twin room gave us gave us room half windows dark dingy 4 star yeah right came back night find room yes hotel surprised tried tell due metro system built said impressed close hotel long manager finally gave us another room worse first room yes 4 hotel way shape form hotel 1 good location best good students back please please donâ€™t spend money staying many places stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: TheDamMaster
Reviews.Content: hotel extremely stay could describe rate didnt even include breakfast 3 nights cost stairs steep floors lifts definately recommend hotel late honeymoon break glad many sights go see hotel relaxing

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, but showing its age”
Reviews.Author: Gazefc
Reviews.Content: hotel situated behind royal palace dam square tram stop front door city centre location makes excellent location everything

Reviews.Title: “[--] 5/5”
Reviews.Author: Vinegarhill
Reviews.Content: title says great location central everything stayed 4 days recommend hotel get rooms discounted price said book hotel would 4 hotel however rated 3 hotel rooms old seems refurbishment rooms ever besides toilet seemed worst thing rooms hotel windows cannot opened way get fresh air open door corridor nice

Reviews.Title: “five star location two star room”
Reviews.Author: minicooperdownunder
Reviews.Content: small hotel excellent location walking distance central station near attractions paid eu 70 per night real bargain room small little closet space clean quite adequate couple nights full bathtub safe tv electric staff pleasant helpful restaurant terrible breakfast costs eu extra lots cafes restaurants around

Reviews.Title: “Great location but very disappointing”
Reviews.Author: Karchristi
Reviews.Content: great location friendly staff complementary great time started notice many room one point actually two video recommend hotel real

Reviews.Title: “Great Place and Great Service”
Reviews.Author: Quass
Reviews.Content: back short break amsterdam stayed hotel moment checked left received professional service smile especially reception travel lot due business say compared hotels service outstanding restaurant experience bad however sometimes staff seem busy instead paying guests rooms need fresh furniture style called classic dutch looking old outdated somewhere past

Reviews.Title: “truly awful!”
Reviews.Author: Mellow_40
Reviews.Content: terrible 4 star hotel great location small rooms without mini bar plastic curtain bathroom night across room

Reviews.Title: “All that glitters is not 4*”
Reviews.Author: Saffy58
Reviews.Content: hotel located right next dam staff friendly speaks english helpfull breakfast buffet excellent wide variety food drinks choose quality food fine rooms clean beds comfortable tv many channels english us shows english dutch cnn available sad hotel high standards nearest supermarket big albert located less 2 minutes away hotel turn right exit entrance walk ahead nearest atm machine dam square tram stop outside hotel 2 goes straight rijksmuseum van gogh museum passes leidsplein shopping areas heart amsterdam shopping dining found within 2 excellent hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “4 star?? No way!!”
Reviews.Author: Napoleon72
Reviews.Content: expensive boring dark dusty standard room arrogant staff horribly overpriced breakfast difficult figure four star hotel really

Reviews.Title: “Not so great”
Reviews.Author: bookem28
Reviews.Content: central expensive worn worth breakfast expensive boring room

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: L_and_GLondon
Reviews.Content: thoroughly good 3 night stay room room wasnt luxury comfortable clean also bathroom good enjoyed going onto stone balcony leading french doors drinking atmosphere bustling street outside especially dark seeing building doors shut loud noise outside loved steak meal restaurant young waitress super took see blue white tiles bar hadnt amazed sight man reception helpful polite answered questions places wanted visit marked map us wouldnt forget wasnt even problem husband came rolling rather late hour fantastic pub centre amsterdam think people wrote bad reviews must made mistake name hotel maybe spent long pub town got drunk got back different hotel wasnt good would stay hotel visiting amsterdam great near places wanted see welcome break quickly back feet ready go enjoy amazing place

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location for exploring Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: floorbye
Reviews.Content: returned short stay die port van cleve hotel amsterdam hotel situated approx 10 mins walk railway station great links airport landing hotel hour including passport control waiting luggage hotel well situated behind palace location none noise dam area taken early flight hoping able leave bags concierge could book however manager said trouble take room early although first room allocated ready manager apologetic upgrading room choice dinner brasserie although quiet excellent meal recommend steak choice visit salad bar restaurant manager gave us history hotel tour bar part original brewery must also mention housekeeping staff never saw people high standard without obvious also worthy high praise recommend hotel without reservation given room upgrade way handled staff cleanliness whole hotel location

Reviews.Title: “Beside Magna Plaza Mall, In the back of Nieuwe Kerk”
Reviews.Author: RigodÃ³n
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights friends overpriced rooms dated stuck 70s mould bathroom dirty stained carpets dressing table hadnt cleaned behind months empty crisp etc coke left bed dull dark room depressing spent time sleeping corridors dated front desk particularly helpful friendly nice front hall uk night taxes including breakfast disappointing sure alot friendlier hotels better rooms facilities hotel disappointing

Reviews.Title: “...its more of a 3 star hotel ...”
Reviews.Author: SimonMu
Reviews.Content: first stop 2 week trip europe hotels nice clean well bathroom nice dam square 5 minutes away walk attractions like museum anne frank house first night got room view royal palace basically front side hotel great problem could open window wouldnt problem wasnt middle summer got hot way stuffy since air conditioning asked front desk give us another room able immediately still nice view fine us though long fresh air far food many cafe shops good food cheap never ate restaurant downstairs since wanted save money recommend getting cafes super delicious overall liked hotel would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: ORDtraverler
Reviews.Content: porters management asked whether would like items taken room porter said yes unfortunately left worth damage contacted management said take lose damage joke staff course damage rooms also hot air conditioning

Reviews.Title: “Looking for a place to stay.....Not here...”
Reviews.Author: Cleve001
Reviews.Content: good hotel small rooms hard soap soap broken never fixed even reported manager towels holes chairs room wash manager bring us talked

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: twist27
Reviews.Content: friend stayed four nights june 08 read terrible reviews didnt really know expect however found hotel clean staff friendly efficient helpful course location excellent would recommend hotel would stay

Reviews.Title: “No complaints!”
Reviews.Author: harrythedog
Reviews.Content: good central location room small dingy air conditioning found floor cleaning standards obviously poor tea coffee facilities provided room well safe minibar good choice tv bathroom fine evening meal expensive restaurant quality price good choice buffet breakfast one night certainly would wanted stay longer hotel certainly 4 stars stayed better 3 star hotels

Reviews.Title: “Amsterdam's best location”
Reviews.Author: jpcheer25
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel last week may 2008 positive experience bar excellent barman barman duty time fantastic good member staff fact staff came across good didnt breakfast evening meal great restaurant beautiful well set bar wonderful room found relaxing rooms need brought date corridor fifth floor need spent little time room anyway really didnt matter great deal room extremely clean found hotel quiet slept unusual location superb would recommend hotel without hesitation beers bar also good whole experience relaxed one greatly added enjoyment wonderful city one bar really liked would highly recommend superb mean superb dutch beers ten minutes walk hotel go turn right second bridge lovely bar beer another bar good atmosphere

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: nekobaby
Reviews.Content: booked hotel central looked little different norm indeed beautiful reception nice arrived 1030pm booked staff great dissapointment reached room room little cupboard dark dingy 70s style furniture bedding however lovely cotton comfortable bathroom clean acceptable however couldnt stayed offered another room gladly took quickly realised strange ceiling looked liked television didnt work moved room okay least good window offered 3 rooms took one say point like nice surroundings normally fussy expected better information given place wonderful location could cream hotels amsterdam needs good refurbishment staff could helpful especially porter night better things bar beautiful great staff breakfast nice would go thanks staff helping

Reviews.Title: “no complaints here”
Reviews.Author: kittybroadway
Reviews.Content: booked 2 rooms 3 nights 17th 20th 2 couples travelling taxi hotel cost us doesnt look great old saying judging book cover mind inside really warm welcoming room fifth floor really bright decent size 3 steps going bedroom short little hall way inside door bed big comfortable room air conditioning though leave window open lot read reports place looking tired didnt think room clean didnt look date view window rooftop thats big deal want see something go outside second room 4th floor seemed lot smaller one level didnt corridor steps couple commented room size rooms booked time booked exactly honest wouldnt happy friends room site famous steak restaurant wasnt great order either 9 steak done liking say served steak wasnt anything special honest wasnt quite well done requested heard many good things room service menu pretty standard standard nice beware room service breakfast expensive nice special mention goes barman great hotel bar really cool staying around city real oldfashioned tables etc reception staff really helpful checkin checkout helping us directions travel advice hotel location great easy walking distance anne frank madame shopping area red light district large shopping mall supermarket street tram stop outside hotel centraal station 10 minutes walk away id would definatly recommend hotel little expensive others checked worth

Reviews.Title: “Unhappy”
Reviews.Author: ManxieP
Reviews.Content: hotel well located 8 mins walk central station tram also stops outside front door 3 mins walk dam square restaurants stuck somewhere eat rooms small side hotel could rooms clean comfortable pretty well equipped prepared disturbed night trams run late local night expect centre city staff friendly hotel flat screen tvs wireless internet also good bar attached hotel serving several local beers get good rate stay 4 star would rate 3 star bear mind booking

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4 star!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: port van cleve wonderfully located near action yet safe open street minutes red light district 8 minutes train station staff helpful kind efficient rooms large totally adequate room size typical would get large city hotel nyc paris etc building beautiful outside rooms clean

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: scan
Reviews.Content: trying book room hotel possibly worst customer service ever encountered werent prepared book something simple feb year sad thing wasnt one person also management proceeded tell fault didnt understand would get hotel hotel doesnt believe years

Reviews.Title: “Oh Dear”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: average hotel great location located almost directly behind royal palace dam square heart amsterdam location important good pick even walk hotel centraal railway station walk along damrak street turn right dam square walk past palace new church youll see right across street much citys best attractions short walk tram ride away room small somewhat ordinary ac downstairs bar restaurant restaurant noted good manager dealt needed dealing fairly public arrived ordered food large group italian tourists showed got priority food us complained manager woman basically said arrived tour group declined give us complimentary drink waiter suggested poor service indeed still would recommend hotel friend youre looking many amenities extras

Reviews.Title: “Not a good deal”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: booked hotel via easyjet booking flights prior booking flights enquired direct hotels website found quite expensive surprised find easyjet website much cheaper direct picked hotel several times previously bar website would 55 bar really worth visit always found staff average goes staff throughout hotel experience anyway plentiful good quality problem room clean really lets rest experience minute room desperate need renovation actually got impression easyjet frills floor getting discounted room line standard rooms within hotel even hallway room need decoration hallways looked two nights ate restaurant across road slightly difficulty stairs need visit could describe access cross said really enjoyed meal surroundings second night went visited several times never disappointed

Reviews.Title: “good hotel perfect location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: stayed one night november 6 2007 hotel originally booked expedia didnâ€™t room put first night paid taxi back next day hotel originally booked one stay gave better opportunity see central part amsterdam without worry last train back hotel reviews said great location close dam square red light district anne frank house main railway station things want see amsterdam public transport right outside hotel didnâ€™t hear noise mainly one inner rooms small window looks across courtyard another room although stuck head room looked right could see outside world room small side small closet clothes didnâ€™t hanging rail hung clothes deep enough take clothes normal way room clean well equipped lcd tv comfortable bed virtually store anything sit except small desk think like lot hotels amsterdam hotel number buildings rooms canâ€™t comment value money paid rate hotel accommodate first night hotel staff friendly efficient able answer questions didnt eat hotel didnt use facilities hotel cant comment sure would want spend much time dark tiny room guess amsterdam spending much time room anyway

Reviews.Title: “4*? I don't think so”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: chose hotel location advertised 4 star hotel yes location good close dam square within walking distance many attractions room dark almost depressing plus dark brown colour made difficult read complain telling staff worked travel would putting report hotel gave upgrade new room much hotel 25 3 star found staff polite friendly breakfast good offer wide choice food would suggest shop around book hotel rooms need renovation pity hotel location great
